title.rendered: Three Strikes and Out: How e-commerce platforms can protect consumers from repeat offenders

excerpt.rendered: Incopro’s white paper provides real-world data on the volume of repeat infringement, the current approach by platforms, and how the issue could be tackled with robust seller verification and a ‘three strikes and out’ policy.
